Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits members of the legislature and statewide elected officials from receiving certain income
Summary: Prohibits members of the legislature and statewide elected officials from receiving certain income.
LawCode: Add ยง5-b, amd ยง80, Leg L; amd ยง74, Pub Off L; amd ยง94, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, the public officers law and the executive law, in relation to prohibiting members of the legislature and statewide elected officials from receiving certain income
